questions.question_hindi: निम्न में से किस पशु सेसिन्धु घाटीके लोग सामान्यत: परिचित नहीं थे?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Which of the following animals were the people of the Indus Valley generally not familiar with?
questions.explanation_english: The people of the Indus Valley Civilization (Harappan culture) were familiar with cattle (including oxen and cows), dogs, and other domesticated animals. However, there is limited archaeological evidence to confirm that they domesticated horses extensively. While some horse remains have been found at sites like Harappa, their use was not as common as other animals. Horses became more prominent in later Vedic cultures.
questions.explanation_hindi: सिंधु घाटी सभ्यता (हड़प्पा संस्कृति) के लोग गाय, बैल और कुत्ते जैसे पशुओं के साथ परिचित थे। हारप्पा जैसे स्थलों पर घोड़ों के अवशेष मिले हैं, लेकिन घोड़ों का व्यापक रूप से पालन नहीं किया गया था। घोड़े बाद के वैदिक संस्कृति में अधिक महत्वपूर्ण बने।
key_facts: Indus Valley people domesticated cattle, oxen, and dogs.
Horse remains found at Harappa suggest limited familiarity, but not widespread domestication.

questions.question_hindi: आखेट एवं पशुपालन का कार्य सर्वप्रथम किस काल में शुरू हुआ?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: When did the work of hunting and animal husbandry first begin?
questions.explanation_english: The Neolithic Age (New Stone Age) marks the transition from nomadic hunting and gathering to settled communities with agriculture and animal domestication. During this period, humans began domesticating animals like sheep, goats, and cattle for food, labor, and other resources. This era is characterized by the development of tools for farming and the establishment of permanent settlements.
questions.explanation_hindi: नव पाषाण काल में शिकार और पशुपालन का विकास हुआ। इस दौरान मनुष्यों ने भेड़, बकरी और गाय जैसे पशुओं का पालन खाने, काम और अन्य संसाधनों के लिए शुरू किया। इस युग में कृषि के लिए उपकरणों का विकास और स्थाई बस्तियों की स्थापना हुई।
key_facts: Animal domestication began during the Neolithic Age (8000–2000 BCE) in India.
The Neolithic period saw the shift from nomadic lifestyles to settled agricultural communities.

questions.question_hindi: 'संविधान सभा' के अस्थायी अध्यक्ष कौन थे?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Who was the temporary president of the 'Constituent Assembly'?
questions.explanation_english: The Constituent Assembly of India was formed in 1946 to draft the Indian Constitution. The first session was held in December 1946. Initially, the oldest member of the Assembly, Sachchidananda Sinha, was appointed as the temporary president until a permanent president was elected. Dr. Rajendra Prasad was later elected as the permanent president. Dr. B.R. Ambedkar chaired the Drafting Committee, and Jawaharlal Nehru was the first Prime Minister of India.
questions.explanation_hindi: भारतीय संविधान सभा का गठन 1946 में भारतीय संविधान के निर्माण के लिए किया गया था। पहली बैठक दिसंबर 1946 में हुई। शुरूआत में, सभा के सबसे बुजुर्ग सदस्य सच्चिदानंद सिन्हा को अस्थायी अध्यक्ष नियुक्त किया गया था जब तक कि एक स्थायी अध्यक्ष का चुनाव नहीं हो गया। बाद में डॉ. राजेंद्र प्रसाद को स्थायी अध्यक्ष के रूप में चुना गया। डॉ. भीमराव अम्बेडकर ड्राफ्टिंग कमेटी के अध्यक्ष थे, और जवाहरलाल नेहरू भारत के पहले प्रधानमंत्री थे।
key_facts: Sachchidananda Sinha was the temporary president of the Constituent Assembly until Dr. Rajendra Prasad was elected as the permanent president.
Dr. B.R. Ambedkar chaired the Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly.

questions.question_hindi: पहली बारराष्ट्रपतिशासन कब लागू किया गया?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)

questions.question_hindi: भारतमेंराज्यपालबनने वाली पहली महिला कौन थीं?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Who was the first woman to become a Governor in India?
questions.explanation_english: Sarojini Naidu was the first woman to be appointed as a Governor in independent India. She served as the Governor of Uttar Pradesh from 1947 to 1949. While Padmaja Naidu became the first woman Governor of Hyderabad in 1948, Sarojini Naidu's appointment in 1947 predates this. Rajkumari Amrit Kaur later became the first woman Governor of Punjab in 1948.
questions.explanation_hindi: सरोजिनी नायडू भारत में स्वतंत्रता के बाद पहली महिला राज्यपाल बनीं। वे 1947 से 1949 तक उत्तर प्रदेश की राज्यपाल रहीं। जबकि पद्मजा नायडू 1948 में हैदराबाद की पहली महिला राज्यपाल बनीं, लेकिन सरोजिनी नायडू की नियुक्ति 1947 में हुई थी। राजकुमारी अमृत कौर बाद में 1948 में पंजाब की पहली महिला राज्यपाल बनीं।
key_facts: Sarojini Naidu became the Governor of Uttar Pradesh in 1947, making her the first woman Governor in independent India.
She was also known as the 'Nightingale of India' for her contributions to Indian literature.
